rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment describes detections factually without high-potency language.
No question is present in the text.
The segment reports facts about detections and contains no explicit calming cue.
The segment does not contain a bare negation about risk, cases, or spread.
Reports detection of a strain at other properties, not a capability or preparedness measure.
Reports number of properties ('at three other properties'), a numerical metric.
